Name: Viewergames Arcade
About the game: This is a small racing game specifically tailored for Twitch Streamers . As a streamer, you fire up the game and your viewers can immediately join in without any additional downloads. Many of Twitch's integration features are supported: A Twitch Extension for convenient controlling and interaction of viewers directly from the channel page - Set waypoints, manage car layouts, fire items Use Channel Points for getting in-game items or triggering real-time events - Oil, Boost, and Bombs Allows use of Twitch Bits to support the streamer and get cosmetic goodies for players to customize their car and its effects
